alert.note: Alert for Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 7:30PM MST until July 31 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Pima County in southeastern Arizona... South central Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 815 PM MST. * At 729 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Avra Valley, or 8 miles west of Marana, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marana, Avra Valley, Picacho Peak State Park, Saguaro National Park West, Picture Rocks, Red Rock, Silver Bell and Dove Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
